heading: HB01551
0: AN ACT GRANTING DULY APPOINTED REGIONAL TRIAL COURT JUDGES AN INCENTIVE TO BE CALLED A HAZARD PAY EQUIVALENT TO AT LEAST TWENTY PERCENT (20%) OF THEIR MONTHLY BASIC SALARY/PAY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on JUSTICE since 2016-08-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01551
FULL TITLE : AN ACT GRANTING DULY APPOINTED REGIONAL TRIAL COURT JUDGES AN INCENTIVE TO BE CALLED A HAZARD PAY EQUIVALENT TO AT LEAST TWENTY PERCENT (20%) OF THEIR MONTHLY BASIC SALARY/PAY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
